attributes.action: Reject any motions to extend the copyright term for sound recordings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United States of America has a copyright term of 95 years. Consequently the arrangement of the traditional song "Happy Birthday" remians in copyright to Time Warner until the year 2030.

This situation is clearly absurd, 50 years is plenty of time for an artist to benefit from his works, after which we the public demand the right to embrace what culture and traditions may have been built upon these works without further restrictions.
